thread.title: Every twist and turn of every Tube line revealed in a geographically accurate map
thread.title_full: Every twist and turn of every Tube line revealed in a geographically accurate map | London - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Every twist and turn of every Tube line revealed in a geographically accurate map
text:
London's famous Tube map has never quite looked like this. Every twist and turn is revealed in this geographically accurate map.
Credit: TfL The map emerged after a Freedom of Information request for its release. CityMetric reports James Burbage asked Transport for London for:
A geographically accurate map of all the stations, platforms, lines and tracks that form the London Underground, London Overground, Docklands Light Railway and National Rail services where applicable, which is updated as of August/September 2014.
â€“ James Burbage Credit: TfL The version of the map we're more familiar with ignores the physical layout of the Tube, so it's it's easy to forget just how big the network is.
Credit: TfL You can take a look at the map in full here .
Last updated Wed 16 Sep 2015 Travel London
